messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Have I got some ANIMANIACS learnin' for you!
messages.msgSnippet: I m not saying it may not have it s good points, but to us the things that are in it that we find objectionable outweigh what good their might be. E ...
messages.messageBody:
I'm not saying it may not have it's good points, but
to us the things that are in it that we find
objectionable outweigh what good their might be.

E

--- Deborah Lewis <ddzimlew@...> wrote:
> ***Take Animaniacs...popular children's
> cartoon...the
> characters are rude to each other, obnoxious,
> foul-mouthed (they may not swear but that's beside
> the
> point); ...***
> Animaniacs helped spark Countless interests at our
> house. Countless
> and I haven't even started with The Simpsons and
> South Park yet!
> Deb L
> HERE COMES ATTILA (Episode 93)
> by John P. McCann
> Sung to Old Dan Tucker.
> Yakko: The Roman world was in a mess
> The emperor wore a...
> YW+D : ...cocktail dress
> Yakko: When in the year 441
> Came a guy, Attila the Hun.
>
> YW+D : Run away; here comes Attila
> Flee today; he'll sack your villa
> Run away; here comes Attila
> He'll swipe your hogs and then your pillo'.
>
> Wakko: Attila was a nasty king
> He and his Huns wrecked everything
> He lived by arson and the sword
> Invaded France 'cause he got bored.
>
> YW+D : Run away; here comes Attila
> Far away; go to Manila
> Run away; here comes Attila
> He'll steal your socks and then your pillo'.
>
> Yakko: I guess he had a thing for pillows!
>
> Dot : To a wedding Attila went
> Looking sharp like a Hunnish gent
> He ate a whole ox, then ate two
> Then passed away, but so would you.
>
> YW+D : Come on back; farewell, Attila
> Ate three ox, and got his fill-a
> He wore shorts made of chinchilla
> His favorite ice cream was strawberry.
>
> Yakko: What can I say? It's not a perfect world.
>
> YW+D : Attila!
> Attila!
> Attila Gorilla for sale!
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been
> removed]
>
>

messages.subject: Have I got some ANIMANIACS learnin' for you!
messages.msgSnippet: ***Take Animaniacs...popular children s cartoon...the characters are rude to each other, obnoxious, foul-mouthed (they may not swear but that s beside the
messages.messageBody:
***Take Animaniacs...popular children's cartoon...the
characters are rude to each other, obnoxious,
foul-mouthed (they may not swear but that's beside the
point); ...***
Animaniacs helped spark Countless interests at our house. Countless
and I haven't even started with The Simpsons and South Park yet!
Deb L
HERE COMES ATTILA (Episode 93)
by John P. McCann
Sung to Old Dan Tucker.
Yakko: The Roman world was in a mess
The emperor wore a...
YW+D : ...cocktail dress
Yakko: When in the year 441
Came a guy, Attila the Hun.

YW+D : Run away; here comes Attila
Flee today; he'll sack your villa
Run away; here comes Attila
He'll swipe your hogs and then your pillo'.

Wakko: Attila was a nasty king
He and his Huns wrecked everything
He lived by arson and the sword
Invaded France 'cause he got bored.

YW+D : Run away; here comes Attila
Far away; go to Manila
Run away; here comes Attila
He'll steal your socks and then your pillo'.

Yakko: I guess he had a thing for pillows!

Dot : To a wedding Attila went
Looking sharp like a Hunnish gent
He ate a whole ox, then ate two
Then passed away, but so would you.

YW+D : Come on back; farewell, Attila
Ate three ox, and got his fill-a
He wore shorts made of chinchilla
His favorite ice cream was strawberry.

Yakko: What can I say? It's not a perfect world.

YW+D : Attila!
Attila!
Attila Gorilla for sale!

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
